## Installation

You can install the released version of raddins from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("raddins")
```

Please note that the 'raddins' project is released with a
[Contributor Code of Conduct](.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
